3. saga.adaptor.userpass¶

This adaptor stores user_id and user_pass tokens, to be used for backend connections.

3.1. Version¶

v0.1

3.2. Supported Schemas¶

  • userpass : this adaptor can only store username/password pairs.

3.3. Configuration Options¶

enabled

enable / disable saga.adaptor.userpass adaptor

  • type : <type ‘bool’>
  • default : True
  • environment : None
  • valid options : [True, False]

3.4. Supported Capabilities¶

attributes

  • Type
  • UserID
  • UserPass

3.5. Supported API Classes¶

  • saga.Context

3.5.1. saga.Context¶

class saga.adaptors.context.userpass.ContextUserPass(api, adaptor)[source]¶

Bases: saga.adaptors.cpi.context.Context

init_instance(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
